nodes.text: Mari-Lucen was a female Human living during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Affiliated with House Thul, she sold various items near the Thul Palace on Alderaan.

Mari-Lucen appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Imperial players on Alderaan. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Mari-Lucen was removed from the game along with the rest of the Modifcation Commendations Vendors. Her position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
